name: Red Descent
description:
This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam #198. The game puts you in the shoes of a soldier of the blue army. Hundreds upon thousands of Red bots are invading your homeland! How long can you last before they overwhelm you?!?!

The Theme of the game jam was the word 'Descent'. I looked up the definition to see if their were other meanings aside from the one that popped in my head instantly and Merriam Webster said "5a: ATTACK, INVASION //descent of the locusts"

And thus I knew what I was going to make. All assets including images and art were made by Me. Except for the Weekly Game Jam logo and the GDevelop logo if it wasn't obvious yet.

I would love to continue this project because many features I wanted to add I couldn't due to lack of knowledge of GDevelop's logic systems. If you have suggestions just let me know in the comments.
